mng: to gather, to unite, to unify, whole

exm.mng: statistics, to count, to add up
to unify, to unite, to integrate
to be collectively called, collective term, general designation
general, broad, sweeping, lacking in detail, vague
united front (abbr. for 統一戰線|统一战线), consolidation
Zhengtong Emperor, reign name of sixth Ming Emperor Zhu Qizhen 朱祁鎮|朱祁镇[Zhū Qí zhèn] (1427-1464), reigned 1435-1449, Temple name Yingzong 英宗[Yīng zōng]
